flawed_nl_solution:
If he had 200 fish and sells 50, he is left with 200 - 50 = <<200-50=510>>510 fish
If a third of them get spoiled 1/3 * 510 = <<510*1/3=170>>170 fish get spoiled
The remaining number of fish is now 510 - 170 = <<510-170=340>>340
He then gets 200 more to make 340 + 200 = <<340+200=540>>540 fish

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 150, not 510. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
